lastseen.name: White Dog
lastseen.about: A lost white german shepard is found by a girl, but she doesn't know the dog was trained to attack black people.

lastseen.name: Biccentennial Man
lastseen.about: Based in Isaac Asimov story. Andrew is a special robot who wants to be like a human.

lastseen.name: Blow Out
lastseen.about: A movie sound expert who witnesses a car accident while recording sounds. After check his tape, he finds out that it was actually a murder.

lastseen.name: Narrow Margin
lastseen.about: A district attourney has to protect an homicide witness and hide her in a train while does not know who to trust.

lastseen.name: Climax
lastseen.about: An intense and not easy experience. The film follows a group of dancers at a party to celebrate the end of rehearsals. With alcohol and LSD gradually the atmosphere of friendship disappearing and fears and insanity emerge.

lastseen.name: El Orfanato
lastseen.about: A young girl named Laura is adopted into an orphanage and 30 years later returns with her husband and son planning to reopen for disabled children. The child claims to talk with other boy, an imaginary friend.

lastseen.name: Dor y Gloria
lastseen.about: A young girl named Laura is adopted into an orphanage and 30 years later returns with her husband and son planning to reopen for disabled children. The child claims to talk with other boy, an imaginary friend.

lastseen.name: Malasaña 32
lastseen.about: Inspired by real events that took place in the 70s, the film portrays a family that goes to Madrid to live a dream and is faced with their worst nightmares in an apartment dominated by a supernatural force.
